thread.title: Air Travel FAQ - Questions and Answers About Air Travel
thread.title_full: Air Travel FAQ - Questions and Answers About Air Travel

author: By Arlene Fleming
title: Air Travel FAQ - Questions and Answers About Air Travel
text: Air Travel FAQ - Questions and Answers About Air Travel...in this part, a series of questions and answers received from About.com Air Travel readers, and my replies. 1. How Do I Get an Aisle / Window Seat? More » 2. How Can I Get My Frequent Flyer Miles Added to My Account? More » 3. What is the Deal with Credit Cards and Frequent Flyer Mileage? More » 4. Can Others Use Their Frequent Flyer Miles to Get Me an Airline Ticket? More » 5. How Can I Get My Stroller Back For Long Connections Between Flights? More » 6. Can I Make Changes to a Ticket Booked through a Consolidator or Bucket Shop? More » 7. Can I Not Use Part of A Roundtrip Ticket? More » 8. Was My Ticket Issued, and if so, How Can I Get Credit for an Unused Ticket? More » 9. How Can I Book A Bassinet / Sky cot for an Infant? More » 10. Arrived Late at the Airport - Why Can't I Check-in? More » 11. How Can I Register for Flights as a Gift Without Choosing a Specific Airline? More » Share
